p: The chemical composition of the essential oil was analyzed by gas phase chromatography/mass spectrometry (GC/MS) with the injection of 1 μL (Auto Injector AOC-20i) in a GCMS-QP 2010 Ultra (Shimadzu) equipped with a Rtx-5MS silica capillary column (Restek, USA) 30 m long × 0.25 mm inner diameter coated with 5%—diphenyl/95%—dimethyl-polysiloxane (0.25 μm film thickness).
